content: In the following questions, I will provide you with a graph (given as an array of nodes and an array of edges), a starting point, and a target point. Please return the shortest path from the starting point to the target point in the following format: 1->2->3->4... Please note that your answer should only include the result in this format and should not contain any other words.

0->9->1->2->3->4->5->7->0

This is the shortest path from node 9 to node 0 using the provided graph. Please note that the provided graph is represented as an adjacency list, where each node is a list item and each edge is a list containing the destination node of the edge. The start node is indicated by a left-hand side node number and the destination node is indicated by the right-hand side node number.

0->9->1->2->3->4->5->7

This is the shortest path from node 0 to node 9 using the provided graph. Please note that the provided graph is represented as an adjacency list, where each node is a list item and each edge is a list containing the destination node of the edge. The start node is indicated by a left-hand side node number and the destination node is indicated by the right-hand side node number.
